alert.note: Alert for Duval; Jim Wells; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 8:01PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN DUVAL...SOUTHEASTERN LA SALLE...EASTERN WEBB...MCMULLEN...NORTHWESTERN JIM WELLS AND SOUTHWESTERN LIVE OAK COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM CDT... At 800 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of Clegg to 11 miles west of Freer to 7 miles southeast of Callaghan. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Freer, Midway, Seven Sisters, Loma Alta, Calliham, Tecalote, Annarose, Ranchitos Las Lomas, Rancho De La Parita, Clegg, Rosita, Callaghan, Aguilares, and Oilton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 28 and 29. US Highway 281 between mile markers 656 and 662. US Highway 59 between mile markers 732 and 822. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Duval; Jim Wells; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb
